      static class  DecoratedListUI.ListDecoration 
      static class  DecoratedListUI.RepaintingListDecoration

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String KEY_DECORATIONS
      A list must define this client property as an array of ListDecorations for this UI to interact with the decorations.
